direction.raw_text: and his mule zigzag along the bottom of sun scorched dunes. 2

direction.raw_text: The mule and the boy finally reach a camp.  A few tents dwarfed by a huge temple door jutting out of the sand.  The camp is deserted except for some kids by the temple entrance holding large mirrors, reflecting light into the temple. Omar leaves his mule in the shade, seizes two goatskins and slips inside the temple. 3
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Omar makes his way uneasily down a pillared corridor that opens into a vast room where an old scientist stands on a small wooden ladder in front of the wall across the room.  PROFESSOR MASSIMO PACOLI. A young man is beside him, BILLY MASTERSON, age 25, an American student. He has a large sketchpad in his hands.  Behind them AZIZ, age 10, whose job is to hold the last mirror which shines light into the expansive room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His fingers trace across the wall which is covered with symbols and strange hieroglyphs as he deciphers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Professor points emphatically to the snake, the symbol of Evil, coming through the door between the three planets in eclipse.  C.U. Billy's hand sketches the snake quickly.  He is a natural artist.

direction.raw_text: ... wakes up a man trying to escape from a nightmare. KORBEN DALLAS rubs his head.  Thirty five years old, short hair, powerfully built, unquestionable charm, good looking in spite of the scars here and there. The alarm clock is still ringing, it shows the date as March 18, 2359.  It in two in the morning. Ha grabs a cigarette, and stops to look for a light.  He shuts oft the alarm.  He hears a cat mewing in the hall.  But it still rings.  Korben takes a moment and then realizes it in the phone that is ringing.

dialogue.raw_text: (to the President) The Mondoshawans don't belong to the Federated Territories, but they are peaceful... in their possession are the four elements of life. These elements when they are gathered around a fifth: The Supreme Being, ultimate warrior, created to protect life......

dialogue.raw_text: ..will produce what the ancients called the light of creation, the light of total goodness which is the only thing that can defeat EVIL.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But what happens if instead of this... Ultimate Warrior... it is EVIL who stands here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: White turns to black.  Light to Dark. Life to Death.  For all eternity.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sir, we have a Mondoshawan spaceship at the frontier requesting permission to enter our territory.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I guess I should make a decision..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They are the only ones who can help..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sir..the Mondoshawan do not belong to the federation. We do not know their intention.. I must recommend a full trinuclear assault..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (yells) Did you see that..thing..swallow our battleship like a gum drop?  You can't even tell me what it is! I ask you for options you give me bullshit. Give them permission to enter our territories with my warmest regards.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (relieved) Thank you, Mr. President. 40
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: .  PRESIDENT'S  OFFICE - OMIT 42        EXT.  SPACE / INT.  MONDOSHAWAN  SHIP The MONDOSHAWAN spaceship zips across the Federated Galaxy. But it is not alone: Two black warships seem to be dogging it. 43

dialogue.raw_text: Two non-identified ships approaching.

direction.raw_text: sits at the controls of the warship. His terrifying features tell us what sort of welcome they can expect.  The pilot fires without warning. 45

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Send out a distress signal!!! Activate the emergency landing procedure!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Impact in less than ten seconds!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In response, the cat meows.  Korben opens the door to..A huge gun, brandished by a nervous MUGGER, pointing right in his face.

direction.raw_text: And with lightning speed, Korben blasts the mugger with a straight right hand, sending him down for the count.  Korben retrieves the gun.

direction.raw_text: As the mugger clears his head, Korben opens a drawer next to him which is full of similar guns! The mugger's eyes pop out of his head.  He scampers to his feet and runs off. Korben shrugs, exits his apartment, and closes the door.  The cat watches a nuclear holocaust on T.V.,  uninterrupted. 46B

dialogue.raw_text: Don't watch it all day, it'll rot your mind. Bye sweetie..

dialogue.raw_text: The cash man!

direction.raw_text: .  RED  PLANET ORBIT - OMIT 52        INT.  LABORATORY  1ST DISTRICT  MANHATTAN - DAWN An arm, on a surgical cart, moves down the hall of the Nucleological Center, the most sterile of environments.

direction.raw_text: age 60, hurries alongside GENERAL MUNRO.

direction.raw_text: They pass into the lab. 53
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is all that survived?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Actually only one cell survived..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Have you identified it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's not that easy..we've never encountered anything like it before..you see normal human beings have 40 DNA memo groums..which is more than enough for any species to perpetuate itself..This one has 200,000.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Talk English Doc.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This cell is like a huge library. It has infinite genetic knowledge stored inside. Almost like it was...engineered.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sounds like a freak of nature to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes... I can't wait to meet him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The two enter a cylindrical laboratory.  There is a huge glass turbine in the middle with the metal glove inside.  A DNA chain scrolls on the computer screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Munro hesitates a moment.  Then he sighs and uses his personal key to open the self-destruct box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mactilburgh starts the operation rolling as Munro puts his hand on the sell-destruct button, ready to use it.  Thousands of cells form in the heart of the generator, an assemblage of DNA elements.  Then the cells move down a tube, like a fluid, and gather in an imprint of a HUMAN body.  Step by step bones are reconstructed, then the nervous and muscular systems. Whole veins wrap around the muscles.  An entire body is reconstructing before our very eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shield comes over the reconstructing body and makes it invisible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The meter slows, drops to zero.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A whoosh of air in the glass chamber.  Captain Munro has his hand on the self-destruct button, ready to destroy the being that has barely been reborn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An electrical discharge fills the glass chamber causing the body inside to jerk. After a few moments of silence, the SOUND of a heartbeat fills the room over the loudspeaker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Supreme Being is alive once again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ASSISTANT automatically removes the ultra-violet shield which slowly reveals... a woman... nude... young... and very beautiful.  Munro stands there gaping.  Not quite his vision of the Supreme Being.  Mactilburgh glances at Munro and gently pushes his hand away from the self-destruct button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Munro is hypnotized by the GIRL's beauty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mactilburgh looks at him with a grin.  A remote-control camera approaches the girl's face, a flash goes off.  Blinded by the flash, the girl jumps and screams.  She cowers in a corner, shaking from the cold, darting eyes everywhere looking for the case she was holding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The girl kicks the window repeatedly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ASSISTANT hits a button.  A pile of clothes drops out of a trapdoor in the ceiling.  She snatches up the clothes angrily and dresses quickly. Munro draws closer to the glass window.  He watches her dress with undisguised pleasure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Girl finishes dressing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Munro smiles safely behind his plate glass window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Munro dangles the key on a chain that will let her out.  The girl rams her fist right through the window.  She grabs the key and yanks it.  The chain snaps tight and Munro slams into the window knocking himself out.  The girl puts her hand through the window again, unlocks the chamber and steps out.  She is still bit wobbly on her legs.  Two GUARDS try to grab her. She sends them flying across the room. Mactilburgh is most impressed.  He sets off a general alarm. 54
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (rather fascinated) The compositional elements of his DNA chain are the same as ours, there are simply more of them tightly packed. His knowledge is probably limitless..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (worried) Is there any danger? Some kind of virus?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We put it through the cellular hygiene detector. The cell is for lack of a better word... perfect.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: go ahead! But Mr. Perfect better be polite... otherwise I turn him into cat food.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Three seconds to ultra-violet protection.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Munro) ...This is the crucial phase, The reconstruction of pigment. Cells are bombarded with slightly greasy solar atoms which forces the body cells to react, to protect themselves. That means growing skin. Clever, eh?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (disgusted) Wonderful!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ... End of reconstruction, beginning of reanimation .

direction.raw_text: The girl runs through a maze of corridors looking for a way out.  A squad of SECURITY GUARDS appear in front of her and open fire without warning. The girl takes a leap, grabs an air vent, kicks it out and dives into the air shaft.  The COPS try and jump up to the vent, but none can reach it.

direction.raw_text: She has exited to a ledge on the 450th floor of a building, right in the middle of Manhattan, which we discover for the first time.  The city has become monstrous. Buildings rise 600 stories.  Cars fly.  Subways run vertically...The girl edges along the narrow ledge, unfazed by the height. The CHIEF leans out the vent, looking out into the void.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The COPS stare into the gaping void.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CHIEF angrily pulls out his gun and shoots at the girl who ducks around the corner of the building.  Unfortunately the other side in full of cops as well.  A flying police car zooms up in front of her, sirens blaring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The girl feels trapped.  She looks down into the endless 450 below and all the cars flying underneath her.  Then she raises her arms... and dives off. 57

dialogue.raw_text: (to his men) Go on follow her!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...No way.

direction.raw_text: The police car presses up against the cab.  Doors slide open.  Huge guns point at her.  Korben feels lousy.  The girl's helpless, there are tears in her eyes, she looks exhausted. Korben glances at her in the rear view mirror. She's looking all around to find something to help her communicate with him. Her POV: an ad on the back of the seat. An 800 number to help an orphanage. A teary photo of a kid over the words Please Help.  She shoots to Korben a look of pure distress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben can't resist her plea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he cannot say no to her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben shuts oft the meter and floors it, sideswiping the police car as he roars away.

dialogue.raw_text: Akina delutan, nou-shan.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (staggered) The fifth element.

dialogue.raw_text: (sighing) Finger's gonna kill me... 62

dialogue.raw_text: (eyes riveted on her) He's a she!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (bemused) You noticed...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (face shining) There's not a moment to lose! Wake her up, but be gentle about it!  This woman is mankind's most precious possession! She is... perfect!

(he pulls out a business card) Here, it's a bit late, but... my name is Korben, Korben Dallas. Keep it, you never know, maybe... you'll need a cab one day.  I'll be happy to open the door this time!.

direction.raw_text: A door opens near the police officer's main entrance. Cornelius looks both ways. Then crosses the hall, dragging the Chief of Police by the feet. 170

direction.raw_text: Korben finishes putting on his tux, still on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door RINGS.

direction.raw_text: Korben opens the door.  It's not the champagne.  Even better. It's Leeloo.

direction.raw_text: Leeloo heads right for her suitcase and starts to undress.  Korben has to turn away once more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben turns around.  Leeloo has put on a very simple dress which is sexy to the max.  He is smitten.  So much so that Leeloo wonders if something isn't quite right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leeloo smiles at him, his compliment pleases her.  She turns, revealing her unzippered back.  Korben cannot help but stare at her bare flesh.  Her perfect bottom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben's blood boils.  She wriggles, pressing her hands together close to the zipper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But instead of pulling on the zipper he slips a bracelet on her wrist.  A flourescent beam bursts out of the bracelet and forms a vertical bar going from the floor to the ceiling. Stunned, Leeloo is held captive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She tries to breakout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leeloo tries desperately to get out of the handcuffs. Impossible. Korben sets the radio down in front of her and turns it on. Leeloo looks like she'd like to break his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door flies open.  Loc Rhod barges in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he sees the scene, Leeloo cuffed, in a low cut dress.  His mind goes to the obvious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben grabs him by the collar..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And yanks Loc Rhod out of the room.  Leaving Leeloo looking extremely unhappy. 171
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Listen, Ma! I've only got a few days vacation and I'll be damned if I'm gonna spend them on the phone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...Hang on, it's the door. No! I told you I didn't bring anybody! I'm all alone... as usual!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here we go again...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes... you know there's a lot of differences between men women.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: you can turn around!

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, not at all!  I mean, just the opposite, you're... you're beautiful!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you know how this works?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I have an idea.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And you can't concentrate with me around?.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's difficult.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Army issue. I'm sorry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (seething) You're nothing but a... a...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The words you're looking for weren't in the dictionary you studied. I won't be long.

dialogue.raw_text: Hey Stud we gotta...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Korben my man what's happening here? Who's the chick? What's the gig? We free forming here? Getting funky with the monkey? Can I get in on this?

dialogue.raw_text: No..to all of the above.

direction.raw_text: .  LOC RHOD'S  STATEROOM  FHLOSTON  PARADISE - NIGHT - OMIT 173        INT.  HALL - OMIT 174        INT.  BATHROOM - OMIT 175        INT.  DIVA'S  SUITE  FHLOSTON PARADISE - NIGHT - OMIT 176        INT.  FHLOSTON  PARADISE  OPERA - NIGHT Loc Rhod and Korben enter what turns out to be a replica of the Garnier Opera in Paris.  A hostess escorts them to their seats.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (broadcasting) We have just walked into what is probably the most beautiful concert hall in the universe. Totally awesome! Magnificent paintings on the ceiling. I don't know who painted them, but he must have busted his balls! I see a row of former ministers, more sinister than minister! A few generals practicing how to sleep. And there's Baby Ray, star of stage and screen, drowning in a sea of nymphets. He's not gonna get much out of this concert, he's stone-deaf!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ON: Baby Ray bending his ear to a girl asking for an autograph.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A waiter gives them two glasses of champagne.  Track with the WAITER an he leaves the hall with his empty tray.  He enters a small room reserved for staff. 177
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...to who?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (moving down the aisle) ...And over there is Roy Von Bacon, the king of laserball and the best paid player in the League. (shakes hands as he goes by) ...And over there is the Emperor Kodar Japhet whose daughter Aachen is still at the bar.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: love to sing, too, but in the shower", she recently confessed to me. She will no doubt prove to be as generous tonight as she always is.

direction.raw_text: Korben is tense.  The curtain rises.  The Diva, in a stunning gown, stands in the center of the stage, head bowed.  Behind her, a star filled window.  The MUSIC begins.  The Diva looks up, a rare beauty, but an alien. And then she begins to sing.  Her voice is divine, unmatched.  Korben is swept up in the TEARS. 182

dialogue.raw_text: (ugly mood) Yeah!?

dialogue.raw_text: (in a panic) Mangalores! The Diva's suite! They want the Sacred Stones! They must be stopped. We must stop them!. I'm going to free you but you must promise to help me!

location: FHLOSTON PARADISE LANDING DOCK AND GARAGE

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Probably the time remaining before it explodes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) This is a Type A alert. For security reasons the hotel must be evacuated. Please proceed calmly to the lifeboats located in the main hallways.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Like D-Man, I hate to bother you but uh, like, we're down to 2 minutes here...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey! What are you doing? The bomb!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just relax. I've got the Stones. Everything's going to be fine.

direction.raw_text: seconds left on the timer.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Second Punch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben pummels him mercilessly. 236
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (falling to pieces) Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Leeloo) I'll be right back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiling) Allow me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just for the fun of it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, what do we have here? Is this Korben Dallas? The famous winner of the Gemini Croquette contest? Or is this Korben Dallas from Special Section sent by old Lindberg himself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...In any event, whoever you are, I was glad to meet you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...A 3000 round clip! I didn't fire off
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: rounds... did I?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't you know how to count. It's not all that hard. Watch!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: One! That's for trying to kill me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Two! That's for firing me! Three! That's for pushing around a priest! And the rest is for what you did to my wife!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: President Lindberg prefers closing his eyes.  Munro's shoulders move as if he were beating on Zorg. 237
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zorg falls to the floor, beaten to a pulp.  The timer clicks over to 3 minutes.

direction.raw_text: He picks Leeloo up in his arms. Cornelius grabs Loc Rhod and gives him a resounding slap.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We're outta here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you nuts, Father? That hurts! I can't feel my teeth.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Doesn't matter all you need are your legs. 238

dialogue.raw_text: I didn't fire three thousand rounds... 243
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) One minute to total evacuation...

dialogue.raw_text: You know how to fly this thing?

dialogue.raw_text: (concentrating) It's like a cab isn't it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: seconds...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Found it?

dialogue.raw_text: I don't even know what I'm looking for!

direction.raw_text: : The counter goes 1... 0 -The suite disintegrates - The corridor is consumed. -The main hall is no more. 246

dialogue.raw_text: Solid little jobs, aren't they?

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hello?...

direction.raw_text: rushes in.

dialogue.raw_text: Mr. President.

dialogue.raw_text: (gentle, loving) Apipoulai..

dialogue.raw_text: I'm so very sad.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Five hundred wars... Arms... Drugs... Money... Everything you create is used to destroy...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I told you not to read all that crap!

dialogue.raw_text: Protect life... Until death.

dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) For the praiseworthy courage you have shown us! I'd like to congratulate General Munro for his choice. He found the ideal man for such a...

dialogue.raw_text: There's a ball of fire 1,200 miles in diameter heading straight for the earth. And we have no idea how to stop it! ...That's the problem.

dialogue.raw_text: How much time before the collision?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If its speed remains constant... in an hour and 57 minutes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) I'll call you back in two hours.

direction.raw_text: The ZFX200 is parked in the middle of the desert. Korben walks ahead carrying Leeloo.  Cornelius has the four Stones with him. Barely awake, Loc Rhod stumbles along.  David appears at the door of the chapel.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You're all safe. Thanks be to God!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Later, David! Later! There's not a minute to lose!

direction.raw_text: Lit by torches, Korben sets Leeloo delicately on the altar in the exact center of the four elements.  Cornelius looks over the four Stones every which way.

direction.raw_text: It's obvious he doesn't know where to put it.

direction.raw_text: Korben can't believe his ears.  He tears the Stone out of Cornelius' hand and studies the inscriptions.  He goes over to one of the four bases the stones rest on and tries to figure it out.  The symbol of air is on the Stone, the same as on the base.

direction.raw_text: Korben places the first Stone and picks up another one.  Cornelius has found the symbol for water.  Loc Rhod sits down.  He is very tired.

direction.raw_text: Korben pulls him to his feet and sticks a Stone in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loc Rhod's got it and runs over to put in his Stone.  The four Stones are all in place but nothing happens.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (panic-stricken) Uh, this one... must be water!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't tell me you don't know how all this works?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Theoretically, yes! The four Stones form the beam and the Fifth Element is supposed to stand in the middle there, but... I don't have the reference book. I've never seen the Stones work!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Match the symbols!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is this some kinda game? Like chess?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. It's much simpler. If we don't figure out where these Stones go in five minutes, we're all dead! Think you got it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (lost) Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's what I'm saying. 266
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Loc Rhod stands in front of his Stone looking at Korben.

dialogue.raw_text: Leeloo? The Stones! We have to open them! How does it work?

dialogue.raw_text: (feeble) The wind blows... the fire burns...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know all that, Leeloo! I'm talking about the Stones.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: ...The rain falls...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The rain falls... the wind blows?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Try and figure out how this fucking thing opens, instead of staring at me like that!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (afraid) I'm looking, I'm looking. 268
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The tension is palpable in the President's office.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...Three minutes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've lost contact with them. 269
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Korben and Cornelius turn the Stones every which way.  All to no avai1. Loc Rhod is discouraged.

direction.raw_text: He sighs.  Three hooks pop off the Stone.  Loc Rhod can't believe his eyes.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben blows on the Stone which immediately opens revealing a patch of blue sky with some miniature clouds floating around inside.  A yellow beam pops up like a ray of sunlight, like Korben's smile.

direction.raw_text: The two men move fast.  Korben on the 4th Stone: Earth.  He grabs a fistful of earth  and throws it on the Stone.  A miniature patch of green appears and immediately forms a green beam.  Cornelius wipes his forehead with a scarf and wrings it out over the Stone.  It opens revealing a patch of miniature raging sea.  A blue beam appears. Loc Rhod has a problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Korben pats his pockets, he comes up with a box of matches.  There's only one left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Loc Rhod and Cornelius hold their breath.  Korben strikes the match.  A small flame appears on the tip.  A breeze goes through the room.  Korben feels like he's got TNT in his hands.  He approaches the flame to the Stone. The flame twists, dims, flickers ...but holds on.  The Stone opens.  A patch of miniature fire appears. Korben sighs, snuffs out the match.  The fourth beam, a red one, immediately forms. 270
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...we'll never make it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It... it moved! Korben! Korben!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What did you say? What did you do?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look, you did something that set it off. Try to remember. Concentrate. Tell me exactly what you did!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I was like this... With my hands here and... I said, "We'll never make it!" That's all!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is that all?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah... then I sighed... like this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The wind! The wind blows...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Quickly, everyone on a Stone! Water for water!  Fire for fire! Earth for earth!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shaking) I don't have a light.  I stopped smoking last week! If we'd come a bit sooner...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't breathe.

dialogue.raw_text: It's up to you now, Angel!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm so tired...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can sleep tomorrow... come on...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I want to sleep... forever...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Leeloo! Listen to me! I'll take you on a vacation afterwards! A real vacation, this time, for as long as you want. Come on! You can do it!

dialogue.raw_text: Come on Leeloo! Come on!

dialogue.name: dialogue

A drop of liquid falls to the temple floor and begins to smoke, eating away at it like acid.  Loc Rhod has to dodge another drop of the stuff.  Korben quickly straightens Leeloo up and puts her back in the center of the beams.

dialogue.raw_text: ...Like love...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Exactly.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Scientist's stopwatch goes from 30 to 29 seconds. 277
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A bit of the black acid falls on Loc Rhod's shirt setting it on fire.  He rips if off.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, you do! I need you. More than you can imagine! Stand up straight!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why?... Why would you need me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Because...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to himself) Tell her, for God's sake!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Because... Leeloo has tears in her eyes.  The heat is overpowering.  Black acid is everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Despite her fatigue, Leeloo smiles broadly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Tell me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I love you...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The stopwatch goes from 3 to 2. 279 INT.  CHAPEL LEELOO Now you're allowed to kiss me. - Korben wraps his arms around her and kisses her like he's never kissed anybody before.  - The white beam, the Divine Light, immediately forms around Leeloo and Korben. - The stopwatch hits zero.  - The Absolute Beam explodes from the top of the pyramid and heads straight into the sky zapping the fireball smack in the middle, slowing it down.  - Korben and Leeloo kiss like there was no tomorrow. - The beam hardens and slowly solidifies the Evil Planet.  Inaudible screeches escape from the dying planet.  Screeches of terrifying pain as if a million souls were dying. - Streams of black acid spurt from the pyramid and solidify like brilliant stalactites. 280
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pure beam, the Light of Life, has finished its work.  The Dark Planet nothing more than a dead planet. Strangely enough, it looks like the moon.  Everything is calm around it. 281
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: President Lindberg opens his eyes and realizes he's not dead-
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The planet seems to have stopped at...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: miles from impact. 282
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In the temple, the beam loses its intensity.  But Leeloo and Korben remain stuck together, lost in their kiss.  Cornelius has dropped to his knees, clutching his hands. Loc Rhod slips along the wall with a sigh.  He gives Cornelius a knowing smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cornelius and Loc Rhod burst out laughing.  Korben and Leeloo keep on kissing. 283
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This guy is a killer with the babes. I knew it from the moment I laid eyes on him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We are in the Nucleological Laboratory that gave birth to Leeloo in the beginning of our story.  The President enters the lab followed by a group of officials in ceremonial dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mactilburgh goes to the reactor and opens a small slot which allows him to see what is going on under the blue shield. Leeloo and Korben are naked, arms wrapped around each other, kissing and probably engaged in hoppi hoppa. Mactilburgh looks troubled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President, pressed for time, looks over to his aide who in struggling with a phone call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President takes the phone and goes to the window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Mr. President, let me introduce you to Professor Mactilburgh, who runs the center.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's an honor to receive you. Mr. President.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (beaming) Yes.. Well? Where are our two heroes?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They were so tired from their ordeal that we put them in the reactor this morning..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I have 19 more meetings after this one Professor..
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Of course.. Let me see if they're revived.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We go live in one minute, Mr. President.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .. uh.. they need five more minutes, Mr. President.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No ma'am... I tried... No ma'am...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Some woman... claims she's Korben's mother...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Give it here...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mrs. Dallas, this in the President. On behalf of the entire Federation, I would like to thank...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Don't pull that crap with me, Finger... I'd recognize that trash can voice of yours in a dark alley during a rain storm. You tell that worthless no account son of mine he should plotz for the way he's ignored his mother... when I think of all I sacrificed for him... 284
dialogue.name: dialogue
